benchmarks.name: Enable aaa new-model
benchmarks.description: this command enables the AAA access control system
benchmarks.impact: Implementing Cisco AAA immediately disables former default access methods

benchmarks.name: Enable aaa authentication login
benchmarks.description: Sets authentication, authorization, and accounting (AAA), authentication at login
benchmarks.audit: show run | incl aaa authentication login
benchmarks.remediation: aaa authentication login {default | aaa list name} [passwd-expiry] [method1] [method2]
benchmarks.impact: Implementing Cisco AAA immediately disables former default access methods

benchmarks.name: Enable aaa authentication enable default
benchmarks.description: Authenticates users who access privileged EXEC mode when the yuse the enable command.
benchmarks.audit: show run | incl aaa authentication enable default
benchmarks.impact: Enabling Cisco AAA 'authentication enable' mode is significantly disruptive as former access methods are immediately disabled.  Therefore, before enabling 'aaa authentication default' mode, the organization should plan and implement authentication logins and passwords, challenges and responses, and token technologies
